title: Packersâ€™ FG got so much better set to â€˜Titanicâ€™ music
text:
Packersâ€™ FG got so much better set to â€˜Titanicâ€™ music The Packers will go on. Post to Facebook Packersâ€™ FG got so much better set to â€˜Titanicâ€™ music The Packers will go on.  //usat.ly/2iB6ohK   Packersâ€™ FG got so much better set to â€˜Titanicâ€™ music Andrew Joseph 9:21   
The Green Bay Packers celebrates with kicker Mason Crosby (2) after beating the Dallas Cowboys in the NFC Divisional playoff game at AT&T Stadium. (Photo: Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports) 
There's just something about Celine Dion's "My Heart Will Go On" from Titanic , but when the song gets applied to any sporting achievement, it makes the moment so much better. 
That was proven true for Clemson' championship-winning touchdown . And on Sunday, the Packers got the Titanic treatment for Mason Crosby's game-winning field goal against Dallas. Condolences to the ever expanding Cowboys bandwagon. Packers bandwagon next week? (cc: @TitanicHoops ) pic.twitter.com/qvrdoLKgKE â€” Jessie Karangu ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡ª (@JMKTV) January 16, 2017
